name: Exile's Circlet
description:
After a character uses an Elemental Burst: All your characters on standby gain 1 Energy. (Once per Round)
(A character can equip a maximum of 1 Artifact)
descriptionraw: <color=#FFFFFFFF>After a character uses an Elemental Burst:</color> All your characters on standby gain 1 $[K310]. (Once per Round)\n(A character can equip a maximum of 1 {SPRITE_PRESET#3004}Artifact)
descriptionreplaced: <color=#FFFFFFFF>After a character uses an Elemental Burst:</color> All your characters on standby gain 1 <color=#FFFFFFFF>{SPRITE_PRESET#1110}Energy</color>. (Once per Round)\n(A character can equip a maximum of 1 {SPRITE_PRESET#3004}Artifact)
storytext: "Woe to thee, oh great hall with silver piled high! Why is your crown drenched in blood?"
